ingredients: 1 small papaya, 5 medium Roma (plum) tomatoes, diced,   +   1/2 medium red onion, diced, 1 medium red bell pepper, seeded and diced,   +   1/4 cup chopped fresh basil leaves, 2 tablespoons white sugar,   +   1/4 cup red wine vinegar,   +   1/4 cup vegetable oil,   +   1/2 teaspoon mustard powder, 2 stalks green onions, chopped, 1 (16 inch) French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
nutrition: Total Fat 8g 10%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Sodium 373mg 16%, Total Carbohydrate 41g 15%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 8g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 38mg 189%, Calcium 42mg 3%, Iron 2mg 13%, Potassium 280mg 6%
